title: filesystem
content: # `fastmcp.utilities.mcp_server_config.v1.sources.filesystem` ## Classes ### `FileSystemSource` Source for local Python files. **Methods:** #### `parse_path_with_object` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} parse_path_with_object(cls, v: str) -> str ``` Parse path:object syntax and extract the object name. This validator runs before the model is created, allowing us to handle the "file.py:object" syntax at the model boundary. #### `load_server` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} load_server(self) -> Any ``` Load server from filesystem.
